RainbruRPG::Events::tPersoAttrbHandler

RainbruRPG::Events::tPersoAttrbHandler Struct Reference

#include <ercreateperso.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Events::tPersoAttrbHandler:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A character's attribute handler.

Some character's attributes are stored in this struct to be used with the events.
